content: Here you can set how often you want to auto sync LDAP users

comment.text: This translation key defines the text that describes the setting for automatic LDAP user synchronization, appearing as a title in a UI component. It's used to provide contextual information about the sync functionality within a PortalSettings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'սինխրոնիզացնել' is a transliteration from 'synchronize' and while understandable, a more accurate Armenian word would be 'սինքրոնացնել'.
The translation 'ここでLDAPユーザを自動同期する頻度を設定できます' is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural. A more natural phrasing might prioritize the 'auto sync' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAPユーザの自動同期間隔を設定できます (Ldap user auto sync interval setting)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນ' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'sync' in this context. 'ຊິງ' typically means 'to grab' or 'to take' and doesn't fit the concept of synchronization. A better translation would be something like 'ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນ' (update data) or 'ເຊື່ອມໂອ້ຂໍ້ມູນ' (merge data).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ນີ້ແມ່ນບ່ອນທີ່ທ່ານສາມາດຕັ້ງຄ່າຄວາມຖີ່ທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການໃຫ້ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້ LDAP ໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aici puteți seta cât de des doriți să se realizeze automat sincronizarea utilizator LDAP' is a bit clunky. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be 'Aici puteți seta frecvența sincronizării automate a utilizatorilor LDAP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici puteți seta frecvența sincronizării automate a utilizatorilor LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'să se realizeze automat' can be simplified to 'automat'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici puteți seta frecvența sincronizării automate a utilizatorilor LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයින්' (parishilakayin) is technically correct, but 'පරිශ්රමණිකයන්' (parishramanikayan) might be a more common and natural choice when referring to LDAP users in a technical context. It's a nuance but improves clarity.
The verb form 'želiš' (you want) is less formal than what would typically be used in a settings panel. A more formal and impersonal construction would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tukaj se lahko nastavi, kako pogosto želite samodejno sinhronizirati uporabnike LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'аутоматски' is a valid word, but 'ауто-синхронизујете' (auto-synchronize) is more common and natural in this context. Using just 'синхронизујете' might be clearer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Овде можете да подесите колико често желите да синхронизујете LDAP кориснике
